name: Fidget Spinner New 2017
description:
A real new fidget spinner of 2017 and the best cure for your anxiety!
A fidget spinner also known as hand spinner and fidget ballet is an activity that sits like a propeller on person’s finger, with blades that spin around a bearing. It consists of two or three pronged design with bearing in its circular pad. Flick them to kill time.

It’s all going viral these days also known as hand spinner but don’t get stuck to one common play. Spin the spinner mega pack and see how your spinner evolves in time .Challenge your friends and see how much spins they managed to get.

Spin the fidget cube virtually on your device. Children should use this app as it will help them get focused and to engage them with an activity which will help them to avoid some bad habits like nail biting etc. These activities basically provides a focus vision and keeps you busy for some time.

Download this ultra-spinner on device as fun is guaranteed and stay connected for future apps.

How to play:
Put your finger to rotate it or flip it as it spins just like a real one see how many spins you can get in specific seconds and challenge yourself to purchase spinner speed and grease your wheels with maximum coins collection also challenge yourself to achieve high score and share your best scores with your friends.
Change the view angle and get the feeling that fidget is in your hand.

Features:
• Easy to control
• Smooth play
• Free to play
• Challenging
• Purchase spinner speed
• Real physics
• Relieves stress
• Kill time
• Real virtual simulator 2017
